title: Trump’s Pants > Trump’s Words, Bezos Exiling To Space? 6.8.21
itunes:title: Trump’s Pants > Trump’s Words, Bezos Exiling To Space? 6.8.21
description:
In episode 925, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian / Dumb People Town co-host / Pen Pals co-host Daniel Van Kirk to discuss Trump's recent rally, Joe Manchin's bipartisan bullshit, Netanyahu being ousted, Jeff Bezo's plan to go to space, the new Conjuring movie and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Actually, Trump Was NOT Wearing His Pants Backward At A Weekend Rally
  2. Fox News, CNN Decided Not to Broadcast Trump’s First Major Speech Since February
  3. Joe Manchin: Why I'm voting against the For the People Act
  4. Netanyahu alleges Israeli election fraud, accuses rival of duplicity
  5. Jeff Bezos Will Fly Aboard Blue Origin’s First Human Trip to Space
  6. Weekend Box Office: ‘Conjuring 3’ Scares Up $57 Million Worldwide Cume
  7. The ‘Conjuring’ Universe Is Strong, and Only Getting Stronger
  8. Faith-Based Horror: The Conjuring Is a Misogynistic Cauldron of Toil and Trouble
  9. Can a horror film lead to God?
  10. ‘The Curse of La Llorona’ Promotion With Mexican Healers Draws Criticism
  11. The New Conjuring Movie Is Based On the Real Story Of a Murderer Who Claimed He Was Possessed
  12. Was ‘Amityville Horror’ Based on a True Story?
  13. War Over ‘The Conjuring’: The Disturbing Claims Behind a Billion-Dollar Franchise
  14. LISTEN: Dirty Art Club - Night Swim

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
